description: Enhanced development cooperation between Slovakia and its target countries with a special focus on sharing the Slovak transitional experience, promotion of the ODA cadre and strengthening of the ODA system in the interantional context.

subproject.description:
1. Increased involvement of Slovak professionals and experts in UNDP regional and country programme activities
2. Slovak transitional experience and best practices shared across the region
3. Increased role of the Slovak NGDOs in ODA programming
4. Management of Slovak ODA projects
5. Effective project management and support to MFA SR

The project was modified in October 2009 which resulted in the following outputs effective from January 2010:

1. Increased involvement of Slovak professionals and experts in UNDP regional and country programme activities
2. Slovak transitional experience and best practices shared across the region
3. Increased role of Slovak volunteers in ODA
4. Improved knowledge and skills of public officials involved in Slovak ODA activities and public awareness raising
5. Building of ODA M&E system
6. Strengthening of ODA base in MFA SR
7. Slovak ODA projects in priority countries
8. Effective project management and support to MFA SR
subproject.title: Slovak-UNDP Trust Fund
